sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import "./WeatherStyle/style.css" import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { fetchWeather } from '../../store/weatherSlice' const Weather = () => { const weather = useSelector(state => state.weather.weather) const weatherWeek = useSelector(state => state.weatherWeek.weatherWeek) const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchWeather("Kiew")) }, []) console.log(weather); return (

{weather.location.name}

{weather.location.localtime}

{weather.current.temp_f}°

{weather.current.condition.text}

{weather.current.wind_mph} mph

{weather.current.humidity} %

) } export default Weather
